name: Amelia Incantatum - Unique Customised Figure
description:
Recently graduated from the Yorkshire school of witchcraft Miss Amelia Incantatum is the latest spellcaster in a family who can trace their blood line back to the neolithic period. Though extremely proficient with potions and charms, her shape shifting skills are not so developed. She has been stuck with her tentacles since a badly researched transmogrification experiment during her last summer break…

Standing 9″ tall (without her base) this customised vinyl figure features a stylishly wicked hat, bunch of metal keys, spell scroll, jar of glowing magical particles and “crystal” wand. She stands on a turned wooden base topped with and etched and weathered magical circle sigil.


A one of a kind Doktor A original custom toy. Signed and dated on the underside.

(Vinyl, ABS, paper, brass, leather, found objects, twine, vintage wooden base.)

FREE Tracked and insured shipping included.

name: Boris Stillman - Original Mechtorian sculpture
description:
Able to brew craft ales within his own body. 
He is the life and soul of a party.

An original unique Mechtorian sculpture.

PVC, ABS, Polyurethane resin, Rubber, Lead, Vintage clock key, 
Glass dome with Walnut base. 
5" tall. 
(7" tall in dome.)

FREE Tracked and insured shipping included.

name: Bella Delamere Mechtorian figure -AP- Midnight Edition
description:
The "Midnight Tryst" UK exclusive edition of Bella Delamere.
Deep blue, Black, white and silver.

AP (Artst's Proof) allocation of 20 pieces. Each is signed and numbered under the skirt.

8" tall rotocast vinyl Mechtorian figure manufactured by Arts Unknown.

Non-articulated with removeable key. Comes in a printed box with vac-formed inner tray.


Discarded with the sump oil at a very early age Bella was swept down stream until she found herself by the sea. 
She soon made friends with all forms of aquatic creatures and was taken in and raised by a family of Kraken (the smaller lesser spotted variety). 
Upon reaching adulthood she returned to the surface and emerged into society, remodelled after her adoptive kin folk. 
The tentacles do not raise many comments around town. But her insistence on always waring a mask certainly does. 
Much speculation is whispered about her true identity. And one day she will reveal her secret to the father who left her for dead.

* INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING * 
The shipping quoted is (other than within the UK) covers basic methods. It is NOT tracked or insured. 
For international tracked and insured shipping you need to also purchase the "INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING" item offered on the main sales page. 
Add this to your basket as well as the toy and then checkout. 
You will be charged the regular shipping as well as the International tracking and insurance fee.

If you choose not to add this item your toy will not be insured and there can be NO refund or replacement if it is lost or damaged in transit.

name: Spike - Original Mechtorian Ink Drawing
description:
An original Mechtorian ink drawing by Doktor A.

A Mechtorian with a greats sense of balance.

Ink on heavy watercolour paper. 
Signed and emboss stamped. 
Image 2.5" x 4" 
Paper 3.5" x 5"

name: Cuboid Original Mechtorian Ink Drawing
description:
An original Mechtorian ink drawing by Doktor A.

A simple cube shaped Mechtorian stand waiting.... for tea?

Ink on heavy watercolour paper. 
Signed and emboss stamped. 
Image 2.5" x 3.5" 
Paper 3.5" x 5"

name: High Roller - Original Mechtorian Ink Drawing
description:
An original Mechtorian ink drawing by Doktor A.

A tall baller..

Ink on heavy watercolour paper. 
Signed and emboss stamped. 
Image 2." x 6" 
Paper 3.5" x 7"

name: Tripod - Original Mechtorian Ink Drawing
description:
An original Mechtorian ink drawing by Doktor A.

A simple tripodic Mechtorian with pointy head spikes..

Ink on heavy watercolour paper. 
Signed and emboss stamped. 
Image 3" x 4.5" 
Paper 4.5" x 6"

name: Vintage Mechtorians Greeting Card set
description:
Send an old fashioned greeting in an old fashioned greeting card.
Choose from five different vintage style sepia images of Mechtorian. 
In this set of exclusive cards for any occasion.
Send them to a friend or keep them for yourself. 
Suitable from framing like prints to add that unusual air to your photographic collection.

Each card is 4" X 6" and blank inside for your own message. The set comes with five white envelopes to fit.

name: Small Tripod - Original Mechtorian Ink Drawing
description:
An original Mechtorian ink drawing by Doktor A.

A small three legged fellow.

Ink on heavy watercolour paper. 
Signed and emboss stamped. 
Image 2.5" x 4" 
Paper 3.5" x 5"

name: Mechtorian Badge  "Ed Geers"
description:
Edward Geers ( Ed to his friends) is the third character in the “Mechtorian Badge of the Month” series..

There are FIVE versions of this character badge.

No.9  Antiqued Brass with deep green eyes and a black Bowler hat.
No.10  Antiqued Copper with red eyes and a red Bowler hat.
No.11.  Antiqued Brass with deep green eyes and a green Bowler hat.
No.12. Mourning edition - Polished Silver and black with purple eyes and a Purple Bowler hat.

(Also available the Designer Con 2012 version.. see seperate item listing for this version.)

Relief cast in real metal, polished and partly enamel filled to give a classic vintage look.

Limited edition of 150 pieces.
Each badge is engraved on the rear with it's number.

The badge is 1″ across and has a clasp pin fixing on the rear.

Each piece comes bagged on a display card.

name: Mechtorian Badge "Stephan LePodd"
description:
The tentacularly adorned, adventuringly daring denizen of Retropolis can now be yours as a relief cast metal pin badge. 
Polished, antiqued and partly enamel filled for that classic, vintage look.

Available in two versions :

The summer inspired Stephan LePodd “Strawberries & Cream” edition comes in white, red and polished silver.

The "Mourning" edition comes in black, purple and polished silver

A strict edition of only 100, engraved numbered pieces or each version are available. 
Each badge is engraved on the rear with it's number.

Each badge is 1″ across and has a clasp pin fixing on the rear.

Each piece comes bagged on a display card.

name: Sir Shilling Copperpenny - Mechtorian Metal Badge
description:
The ever popular Sir Shilling Copperpenny gets immortalised in the form of a tiny metal badge…
Yes that capitalist bank manager from Retropolis is now available as a 1″ vintage style metal bade. Part enamel filled and antiqued for an old timey look.

The edition of "Festively" coloured red, white and tarnished silver is strictly limited to only 100 pieces 
Each piece is engraved on the reverse with its unique number. They each come carded and bagged.

This is the first in a series of four different colourways of Sir Shilling which will be made available at intervals over the coming months as part of the continuing Mechtorian badge series..

name: Postcard From New-Yorkshire Limited Edition Postcard Set
description:
A set of 6 postcards featuring Mechtorians from the "A Postcard From New Yorkshire" Show.
Each set is slip wrapped, signed and numbered in an edition of only 30 sets.

Suitable for sending, framing or simply having..

name: Chester Runcorn "Mourning Edition" Spookypopshop Exclusive
description:
Resplendent in royal purple and shining silver ( well a bit tarnished really but who is going to tell him ) this colourway of the latest Mechtorian figure from Kuso Vinyl is EXCLISIVE to the Spookypopshop.

The "Stout" ( A.K.A Mourning ) edition of this 6" tall vinyl figure comes in a splendid flock lined presentation box and is limited to only 120 pieces..



* INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING *
The shipping quoted (other than within the UK) covers basic methods only. 
It is NOT tracked or insured.
For international tracked and insured shipping you need to also purchase the "INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING" item offered on the main sales page.

You will be charged the regular shipping as well as the International tracking and insurance fee.

name: Monsters & Misfits III show catalogue -Signed/Doodled-
description:
A full colour printed catalogue for the Monsters & Misfits III gallery show mounted in Takayama Japan in September 2013. Showcasing work from nine artists in the Circus Posterus collective. Brant Peters, Kathie Olivas, Doktor A, Amanda Louise Spayd, Chris Ryniak, Andrew Bell, Carisa Swenson, Stan Manoukian and Ragnar.

6.5" x 10" 68 pages approx.
There are eight pages of Doktor A's work.

There are two options available here:

Signed version.
At the back of the catalogue there are two blank pages intended for signatures and drawings from the artists. One of these pages has been signed by Doktor A.

Doodled version.
On one of those blank pages there is a simple doodle and signature from Doktor A.(see photos for an example of the level of work to expect.

Why not take your copy of the catalog to future conventions and events and collect all the artist's doodles.....

name: Humphrey Mooncalf AP ( Leprechaun Edition ) -LAST ONE-
description:
This is the "AP" edition of the Humphrey Mooncalf figure ( Leprechaun edition - Japan exclusive ) by Pobber toys.
(AP refers to the limited number of a run that is given to the artist.)

AP Edition of 13.
Signed and numbered by Doktor A inside the cranium of Mr Mooncalf.

In the box you get a Mooncalf rotomolded Vinyl figure with removable skullcap, brain and key.
8" tall (with hat). 
This regular edition had a full run size of 100 pieces.


Humphrey Mooncalf had a reoccurring problem with his Travithick No. 4 Nano-clockwork brain.
Repeated trips to the watch-smith proved a great success. 
The pain held at bay by loosening his cranial rivets.
This however means that he can no longer look up. 
Such a shame, as he does so love the moon.


* INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING *

name: Humphrey Mooncalf (Nocturnal) - Two Left -
description:
This is Humphrey Mooncalf "Nocturnal" edition which has glow in the dark eyes and brain by Pobber toys.

In the box you get a Mooncalf rotomolded Vinyl figure with removable skullcap, brain and key.
8" tall (with hat). 


Humphrey Mooncalf had a reoccurring problem with his Travithick No. 4 Nano-clockwork brain.
Repeated trips to the watch-smith proved a great success. 
The pain held at bay by loosening his cranial rivets.
This however means that he can no longer look up.

description:

(AP refers to the limited number of a run that is given to the artist.)

AP Edition of 13.
Signed and numbered by Doktor A inside the cranium of Mr Mooncalf.

In the box you get a Mooncalf rotomolded Vinyl figure with removable skullcap, brain and key.
8" tall (with hat).

name: Phizog (Midi) Wall Plaque
description:
Phizogs are a new line of cold cast metal Mechtorian wall plaques created by Doktor A.

Available in two sizes and three finishes the Phizogs are open edition sculptural pieces for collectors of robotic whimsy and delight. 
The Midi Phizog is 5″ in diameter and available in Brass, Verdegris or Pewter finishes. 
Each Fez toting, moustachioed visage has an antiqued and polished finish with green painted eyes.

Lovingly hand made in England by Baroque Designs, each piece is hand finished and signed by Doktor A. 
An unusual contemporary collectible artwork in a fine old tradition, created to the highest standard possible.

This page is to purchase a MIDI version.
If the finish you require is not listed in the dropdown menue then it is currently out of stock. More stock will be coming soon so check back later.

name: Uglyography CD -LOW STOCK-
description:
Uglyography's new album "Undercover New Machine" has cover artwork by Doktor A.

A Pen and Ink illustration inspired by lyrics from the tracks on the CD.

The CD comes packed in a high quality printed "Digipak". A fold out card stock sleeve rather than a plastic box with booklet.

The Package is signed on the back by Doktor A.

To hear samples of the music please visit www.uglyography.com

name: Phizog (Mini) Wall Plaque
description:
Phizogs are a new line of cold cast metal Mechtorian wall plaques created by Doktor A.

Available in two sizes and three finishes the Phizogs are open edition sculptural pieces for collectors of robotic whimsy and delight.
The Mini Phizog is 3″ in diameter and available in Brass, Verdegris or Pewter finishes. 
Each Fez toting, moustachioed visage has an antiqued and polished finish with green painted eyes.

Lovingly hand made in England by Baroque Designs, each piece is hand finished and signed by Doktor A. 
An unusual contemporary collectible artwork in a fine old tradition, created to the highest standard possible.

This page is to purchase a MINI version.
If the finish you require is not listed in the dropdown menue then it is currently out of stock. 

More stock will be coming soon so check back later.

name: Rupture Mobile Device Cases  7"  10"   15"
description:
Rupture mobile media device cases from Funky Peanut.

The sleeves are manufactured from high quality 5mm neoprene with a black super soft fleece lining. The all black military grade zipper, black metal pulls and black trim perfectly complement the Rupture design.

Choose from the three sizes avaiable :

7” = 21 x 15cm (Suitable for Kindle and most 7” Android tablets) 
10” = 26 x 19cm (Suitable of all iPads and most 10″ tablets)
15” = 38 x 26cm (Suitable for Apple Probook 15 and similar laptops)

Limited edition of 500.

name: Rupture Art Pass
description:
Series 3 of the popular "Art Pass" sees a "Rupture" design from Doktor A joining the ranks.

A fun vinyl, fold over cover for your travel pass or other I.D.

Simply push the pass out of its pre-cut package, fold it over and insert whatever ( Credit Card sized ) items you like in the two clear plastic pockets.


Choose from the drop-down menu either the regular Rupture Art Pass, which is unsigned.
Or the "AP" Rupture Art Pass which is a signed and numbered version. Only 30 of these were signed.

name: International Insured Shipping
description:
* INTERNATIONAL INSURED SHIPPING *

-  For purchase of toys, badges and prints only -
(Original artworks already have this service quoted as the default shipping method.)

The non UK shipping quoted on the toys is NOT tracked or insured.
For international tracked and insured shipping you need to also purchase this "INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING" item.

Add this to your basket as well as the toy and then checkout.

Your toy will be shipped "Airsure" with Royal Mail and a tracking number issued to you.

If you choose not to add this item your toy will NOT be insured and there can be NO refund or replacement if it is lost or damaged in transit.
